title: Trying to access/upload Audio Recorder files in Android 11
content:
I am trying to access Audio Recorder recordings I have made on my Pixel 4 (running Android 11).

I have followed various articles, trying to find the files in the file system on a USB connection, and tried to upload/share the file to Google Drive, which doesn't do anything. Google Drive app is working and configuring on the phone, but when I try to "Save to Google Drive" for any of the recording files, nothing appears to happen. (I have rebooted the phone, etc. I work in IT, this should not defeat me.)

Tried to share the file to Gmail, but the file is larger than the 20MB limit.

I simply cannot get the file off the phone in any way. Is there a way to access the root file system to get at the files? Surely having a Documents and Media file structure in the file system doesn't make this an impossible task to direct those files there...
